about_the_game:
FN.RUN.HACK is a hybrid third person 3d parkour platformer / hacking simulator with immersive sim elements, set in a futuristic cyberpunk cityscape. Access terminals and servers either physically or remotely; how you complete each mission is up to you.

Features

  • Body Augmentation System: Purchase cybernetic augmentations to expand your movement capabilities.
  • PC Upgrade System: Improve you hacking rig to run more programs, make them run faster, and store more programs and data.
  • Branching Storyline: Who will you ultimately end up serving?

content_descriptors.notes: Billboards around the city contain fake advertisements with sexually suggestive themes, as will as for drugs, tobacco, and alcohol. Visual depictions of violence and death are rare, but it is more frequently implied through text.

detailed_description:
FN.RUN.HACK is a hybrid third person 3d parkour platformer / hacking simulator with immersive sim elements, set in a futuristic cyberpunk cityscape. Access terminals and servers either physically or remotely; how you complete each mission is up to you.

Features

  • Body Augmentation System: Purchase cybernetic augmentations to expand your movement capabilities.
  • PC Upgrade System: Improve you hacking rig to run more programs, make them run faster, and store more programs and data.
  • Branching Storyline: Who will you ultimately end up serving?
name: fn.run.hack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel 9th Gen or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2060 GTX or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A hybrid 3d platformer and hacking simulator. Complete jobs to earn money in order to augment your movement and upgrade your hacking rig to unravel corporate conspiracies in a futuristic cyberpunk cityscape.
